meanings.definition: A person who studies or writes about martyrs.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated martyrologist spent hours researching the lives of saints.
meanings.sent2: The university library has a section dedicated to books written by martyrologists.
meanings.sent3: The young martyrologist joked that studying saints was like solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for history turned her into a martyrologist of the past.
meanings.sent5: The image of the martyrologist surrounded by ancient texts will forever stay in my mind.

meanings.definition: One who compiles or maintains a list of martyrs and their stories.
meanings.sent1: The church hired a talented martyrologist to update the list of saints.
meanings.sent2: Every year, the martyrologist adds new names to the book of martyrs.
meanings.sent3: The meticulous martyrologist color-coded the list of martyrs for easier reference.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the martyrologist saw the list of martyrs as a tapestry of courage.
meanings.sent5: The old manuscript held the key to the martyrologist's understanding of the past.
